name: Irish Trifle
author: Fr. Oliver Clavin

ingredients.name: Custard or instant pudding, about 3 pt.
Strawberries or other fruit for topping

instructions: Mix gelatin with boiling water. Let cool. In the meantime, soak pieces of cake in sherry in bottom of glass bowl. Spread cake with a layer of jam. Pour cooled gelatin on top of soaked cake. Chill. Drain the can of fruit and pour fruit on top of gelatin. Prepare instant pud- ding or custard, and pour over the fruit. Chill. Before serving, top with the whipped cream and cherries, strawberries, peaches or fruit of choice.
